sentence.Network_en: Like Mardi, Pierre is resoundingly unsuccessful, and curiously memorable.
sentence.Network_cn: 和《玛地》一样, 《皮埃尔》失败得非常惨, 可是出奇地让人难以忘记.

sentence.Network_en: Mardi , which followed hard on its heels, was another matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 紧跟着出版的《玛地》, 却是另一回事.

sentence.Network_en: After Mardi, Melville continued to write, almost without pause.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅尔维尔写了《玛地》以后, 继续写作, 几乎没有间断.
